full_summary:
==============

**Advance Contract Award Notice: ELISPOT and Fluorospot Readers Tender**

**Reference Number:** WS3849920487

**Solicitation Number:** WS3849920487

**Closing Date:** February 15, 2023, at 2:00 p.m. (EST)

This is an Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN) for the delivery and installation of ELISPOT and Fluorospot readers for the National Microbiology Laboratory Branch (NMLB). If no supplier submits a statement of capabilities meeting the requirements, the contracting officer will proceed with the award to the pre-identified supplier.

**Tender Description:**

The National Microbiology Laboratory Branch (NMLB) requires the delivery and installation of ELISPOT and Fluorospot readers to support immunology studies for COVID-19 and HIV. The instrument will enhance capacity to support additional collaborative studies with other NML labs and simultaneously measure several properties of cells on a single-cell level.
